fqaAnswer: Veeq is an artificial intelligence-based mastering system used when uploading your own song and selecting a target track. It's designed to apply a high-quality, professional mastering process. Veeq optimizes, balances, and adjusts the sound of your song to achieve a similar audio quality to the target track. Ultimately, it helps you prepare your own song professionally and achieve a sound closer to the desired music style.
fqaAnswer2: AI mastering works by applying the characteristics of a selected target song as a reference to your own song. This process is carried out using Veeq's sophisticated artificial intelligence algorithms. First, the overall sound characteristics and attributes of the target song are analyzed. Then, these attributes are applied and optimized for your own song, adjusting factors such as frequency balance, dynamic range, stereo width, and other audio characteristics. The result is a professionally mastered version of your own song that is closer in sound to the selected target track, allowing you to tailor your song to preferred music styles.
